channel.title: php on Lux-Sit
channel.description: Recent content in php on Lux-Sit

item.title: HTB - Health
item.description: Enumeration Host Discovery First of all we will perform some basic recon. # Adding the target IP as an alias for convenience. ❯ target='10.10.11.176' ❯ echo $target ❯ ping -c3 $target PING 10.10.11.176 (10.10.11.176) 56(84) bytes of data. 64 bytes from 10.10.11.176: icmp_seq=1 ttl=63 time=313 ms 64 bytes from 10.10.11.176: icmp_seq=2 ttl=63 time=35.5 ms 64 bytes from 10.10.11.176: icmp_seq=3 ttl=63 time=34.3 ms TTL value of ~64 is a solid indicator that this is a Linux system.
